title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=240$$ and $$r=60$$, we can substitute $$240$$ for $$d$$ and $$60$$ for $$r$$ into the equation, which gives us $$240=60t$$.
speech: Since we know  d is equal to 240  and  r, is equal to 60 , we can substitute  240  for  d  and  60  for  r  into the equation, which gives us  240 is equal to 60 t .

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$t$$, we can divide both sides by $$60$$.
